title: Maintenance works affecting North East Line services

title_translations.zh-Hans: 维护工程影响东北线服务
title_translations.ms: Kerja penyelenggaraan menjejaskan perkhidmatan North East Line
title_translations.ta: North East Line சேவைகளைப் பாதிக்கும் பராமரிப்புப் பணிகள்

updates.text: Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE1 HarbourFront & NE6 Dhoby Ghaut will be affected by early closure at ard 11pm tonight - 16 Mar. Pls note: Shuttle Bus 22 will be in operation to serve the affected stns while Svcs 315 & 325 will run until 1am.

Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE1 HarbourFront & NE6 Dhoby Ghaut will be affected by early closure at ard 11pm tonight & tomorrow night - Mar 15 & 16. Shuttle Bus 22 will be in operation to serve the affected stns while Svcs 315 & 325 will run until 1am.

Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE1 HarbourFront & NE6 Dhoby Ghaut will be affected by early closure at ard 11pm this Fri & Sat - Mar 15 & 16. Pls note: Shuttle Bus 22 will be in operation to serve the affected stns while Svcs 315 & 325 will run until 1am.

Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE1 HarbourFront & NE6 Dhoby Ghaut will be affected by early closure at ard 11pm this Fri & Sat - Mar 15 & 16. Pls note: Shuttle Bus 22 will be in operation to serve the affected stns while Svcs 315 & 325 will run until 1am.
